alert.note: Alert for Chaves County Plains; Curry County; De Baca County; Quay County; Roosevelt County; Southwest Chaves County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued March 28 at 3:02PM MDT until March 29 at 7:00PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM TO 7 PM MDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...Curry County, De Baca County, Quay County, Roosevelt County, Chaves County Plains and Southwest Chaves County. * WHEN...From 11 AM to 7 PM MDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Take action to secure trash cans, lawn furniture, and other loose or lightweight outdoor objects. Extremely hazardous driving conditions can be expected, especially for motorists in high profile vehicles who should consider delaying travel.

area.areaDesc: Chaves County Plains; Curry County; De Baca County; Quay County; Roosevelt County; Southwest Chaves County
